name: S3FileOperationsTool
modelDescription: Execute S3 file operations: UploadFile to upload one or multiple files, DownloadFile to download one or multiple files, UploadFolder to upload folders with preserved structure, DownloadFolder to download folders with preserved structure. ALWAYS provide params object.
userDescription: Upload and download files and folders to/from S3 with folder structure preservation

command.description: The S3 file operation command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty.

Bucket.description: S3 bucket name (Used by: UploadFile (Required), DownloadFile (Required), UploadFolder (Required), DownloadFolder (Required))

LocalPaths.description: Array of local file or folder paths (Used by: UploadFile (Required), UploadFolder (Required))

S3Keys.description: Array of S3 object keys (Used by: DownloadFile (Required))

S3KeyPrefixes.description: Array of S3 key prefixes/folders (Used by: DownloadFolder (Required))

LocalDirectory.description: Local directory path to download to (Used by: DownloadFile (Required), DownloadFolder (Required))

S3KeyPrefix.description: S3 key prefix/folder to upload to (Used by: UploadFile, UploadFolder)

ContentType.description: MIME type for uploaded files (Used by: UploadFile)

PreserveStructure.description: Whether to preserve folder structure (Used by: DownloadFile, DownloadFolder, UploadFolder)
